A set of cardboard jigsaw puzzles based on the popular animated series Paw Patrol.Bright, attractive colors and shapes along with the beautifully designed background are the main highlights of this jigsaw puzzle.Helps to increase the child’s concentration and focus, and develop their problem-solving skills, visual skills, motor skills, and hand-eye coordination.Assembling the puzzle will improve the child’s fine motor skills, concentration, visual skills, hand-eye coordination, and logical thinking.

A colorful unicorn-themed floor puzzle. The puzzle is suitable for children of 3 years and above. The size of the puzzle is 47.5 x 35 cm with 15 large, easy-to-handle pieces, which are perfect for little hands. The trial and error involved will teach the children to be patient and develop problem-solving skills.
Assembling the puzzle will improve the child’s fine motor skills, concentration, visual skills, hand-eye coordination, and logical thinking. Parents may be required initially to guide their child into this new creative activity to get them into the flow of arranging all the pieces correctly. The product is made with excellent quality materials and printed using non-toxic inks.
